values: A Passion for God’s Supremacy and Compassion for Man’s SoulA Passion for God’s Supremacy and Compassion for Man’s Soul

A passion for God’s glory and compassion for the lost are not mutually exclusive but are fused together in missions because God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in him.
